message:
عايزة خدمة من بتوع اتصالات هنا او حاسبات 
اية function اللى بتحول الكلام من voice ل text مكتوب 
زى تطبيق كدة Voice Master المجاني، اللى ع الموبيل مجرد لما تقولها اسم بتحوله لنص مكتوب
لو حد يقدر يساعدنى ضرورى جدا ويكون لية فى : android
>>>>>
بالاضافة لو حد يعرف يعمل scn عن طريق image process 
ة هياجد text اللى مكتوب فى الورق ويحولة ل speech باستخدام موبيل ابلكشن ليا ازاى اشتغل او الكود وينجز حاجة مبدائية

data.message: I think en mafe4 7aga gahza t3mel keda ,its depends on NLP (natural language processing ) so yo have to build code from scratch using specific algorithms , i will search with you

2wlan speech to text dah esmo speech recognition  w f el android el link dah momken yesa3ed : http://viralpatel.net/blogs/android-speech-to-text-api/    laken enno ye2ra men wara2 dah feeh two steps: 2wel 7aga OCR framework  zay deh (http://www.abbyy.com/mobileocr/android/)  tetargem el 7rof men el wara2 l text w ba3d keda text to speech engine w dool  mawgooden kteer 3shan yekra2 elly et7awel

Like Hussein Said
You can search Google for "Speech Recognition Android" and "OCR Android"
Hussein Mohamed Momtaz does it support arabic?

Since you basically need the whole thing coded for you. It does not seem like you have done any research, you just need someone to come up with solution and code it as well. So, How much are you willing to pay for someone to make it for you?
i have not tried it yet, but arabic support is always hard to find.
did you even google the damn question ?
Maybe she didn't know the right keywords?
Is she asking about keywords? She is asking for code.
Do you want something to decode human genes, cure cancer and enforce world peace along what you asked?!
Seriously?! We now share code in pictures?! What else?! Are we going to write code on paper and send it using the amazing Egyptian postal system?!

Imagine somebody handing you images to copy code from! Pretty unusable isn't it? 

Code is text, can be easily shared. Either by uploading the java classes, or using services like http://www.pastebin.com or http://gist.github.com

For building mobile app like Siri i suggest this SDK 
 http://nuancemobiledeveloper.com/public/index.php
(Speech recognition & text to speech) 
For OCR I used 
https://code.google.com/p/tesseract-ocr/
